commit.message:
Docker Refactor

- Moves to a debian based python container which is MUCH smaller
- Leverages ENTRYPOINT to make the image more versatile
  - It can be run as a service or as the command
- Dramatically reduces size of the image
- Allows for service based configurations through a JSON file that can
  be mounted as a volume

committer Luke Campbell <luke.s.campbell@gmail.com> 1487889227 -0500

Docker Refactor

- Moves to a debian based python container which is MUCH smaller
- Leverages ENTRYPOINT to make the image more versatile
  - It can be run as a service or as the command
- Dramatically reduces size of the image
- Allows for service based configurations through a JSON file that can
  be mounted as a volume
